PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-02552014-03-06,  ,  ,  CIC,  DFATD,  TB,  ,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectRemission Order in Respect of Fees for the Issuance of Passports, Certificates of Identity and Refugee Travel Documents in Relation to Individuals who Died Following the Lac-Mégantic Explosion in Quebec
PrecisRemission Order in respect of FEES FOR THE ISSUANCE OF PASSPORTS, CERTIFICATES OF IDENTITY AND REFUGEE TRAVEL DOCUMENTS IN RELATION TO INDIVIDUALS WHO DIED FOLLOWING THE LAC-MÉGANTIC EXPLOSION IN QUEBEC in order to remit the fee for replacing immigration and/or travel documents that were damaged or lost and to remit the fees for travel documents to those who recently applied, but died as a result of the train derailment and explosion in Lac-Mégantic, Quebec, on July 6, 2013.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2014-0024 Publication Date: 2014-03-26
AttachmentsAttachment
